page.title: 18A DAY IN MY LIFE - KATY BRAY
page.content: 7.30am. Get up, put on brown dress. 7.40am. Lay table, muesli and toast. 8.15am. Let chicken out, clean teeth. 8.25am. Play with ball, jobs for mum - water plants, wash up or dust. 9.10am. Walk to school,it starts 9.15. 9.15am. Spelling test_five groups. Finish off weeks work. 9.45am. Part-time teacher reads story, then work on "homes". 10.45am.Break - talk to my friends. 11.00am.Lessons - sometimes T.V. 12.15pm.Lunch - roast and biscuits. 1.15pm. Assembly - all four classes take turns, one each week. 1.45pm. Sometimes Maths or English. 2.30pm. Afernoon break, then Games. 3.45pm. Go home then to ballet. 6.15pm. Toasted sandwiches for tea. 7.00pm. Swimming at Truro Pool. 8.30pm. Bed-time - asleep by 10.00pm.. .
